author: CBR
description:
Scarlett Johansson joining The Batman Part II sent shockwaves through DC fans, and we break down why this casting is such a big deal! 

From what her role could be to how her move from Marvel to DC reshapes expectations, these are our thoughts.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 9.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/RRjvIuJBwhA
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#TheBatman #ScarlettJohansson #DCU #Batman #CBR #HeroesJourney #Podcast #DC

author: CBR
description:
